property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet with an enemy warlord, deal 2 damage to a target enemy unit at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet, move this unit to that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a Space Wolves unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and +2 HP while it it is at a planet with an enemy warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Space Wolves unit you control at a planet with your warlord deals double damage while attacking an enemy warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet, commit your warlord to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to reduce the cost of each [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit you deploy this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice an [ASTRA MILITARUM] unit to deal damage equal to its printed ATK value to a target enemy army unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, destroy a target enemy support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Deal 1 damage to each unit you control at a target planet without an enemy warlord to ready up to 3 units you control at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit enters play, your opponent may move it to a planet of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, this unit gets +3 ATK until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Look at your opponent's hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When your opponent wins a command struggle, exhaust this support to cancel either the card bonus or the resource bonus of that planet this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this unit to have it gain Flying until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only during a battle. Combat Action: Each [ELDAR] unit you control at a target planet gets +1 ATK and +1 HP until the end of the battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an [ELDAR] Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gains Armorbane.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit moves from one planet to another, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, each other [TAU] unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase. Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit you control moves to your HQ, exhaust this support to gain 1 [RESOURCE] or draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Headquarters Action: Return each army unit with printed cost 2 or lower to its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this warlord is declared as an attacker, move 1 damage from this warlord to another unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a unit moves to this planet, deal it 1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust this support to have your opponent choose and move a non-Vehicle unit he controls from a target planet to an adjacent planet of his choice.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Nurgle unit. Attached unit gets +1 HP. Reaction: After attached unit is declared as an attacker, move 1 damage from attached unit to another unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Remove all damage from a target Nurgle unit you control. Then, have your opponent deal an amount of indirect damage equal to the damage removed among army units he controls at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Interrupt: When a non-Space Wolves unit retreats from this planet, deal 1 damage to that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After a battle at this planet begins, exhaust attached unit to deal damage equal to its ATK value to a target army unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Vehicle army unit. Attached unit gets +2 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust and sacrifice this support to rout a target army unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to deal 1 damage to each unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an [ORK] unit you control is assigned damage by an attack, exhaust this support to prevent all of that damage. Then, deal an amount of indirect damage equal to the damage prevented among [ORK] units you control at the same planet as the defender.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit during the combat phase, destroy a target damaged army unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +1 ATK. If attached unit is a Kabalite, it gains Ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Put a target army unit with printed cost X or lower from your opponent's discard pile into play under your control at a planet. X is the number of Torture cards in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Put a non-Elite Mobile unit into play from your hand at the last planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you search your deck, search an additional 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Move 1 or more Ethereal units you control to a target planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After an enemy warlord commits to the same planet as attached unit, gain 1[RESOURCE].

property.name: Text
property.value: Each [Tau] unit you control at this planet gains Armorbane. Forced Reaction: After this warlord resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, move it to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to ready a target unit at a planet with 1 or more Ethereal units you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an Ethereal unit. Attached unit gains: 'Each other [Tau] unit you control at this planet gets +1 ATK.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, a target [Tau] unit gets +1 ATK and gains the Ethereal trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to move up to 3 [Space Marine] army units at your HQ, each to a different planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a [Space Marine] unit damages an enemy unit, deal 1 unpreventable damage to that enemy unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After a battle at this planet ends, sacrifice this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready a target support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. While at a planet with an enemy warlord attached unit gains Armorbane and Ranged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this unit to ready a target [Ork] support card you control. Then, deal 1 damage to this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Attached unit gets +2 ATK and gains Armorbane.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to draw 1 card if you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this unit to deal 1 damage to a target unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Target a planet. For each non-Nurgle unit at that planet, its controller must choose to either deal 1 damage to it or rout it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to discard the top card of your deck. If the printed cost of the discarded card is 3 or higher, put 2 Cultist tokens into play at your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Pay 2[Resource] to take control of this unit if it is at a planet. Any player may use this ability.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Each player must sacrifice an Ally unit he controls, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the deploy phase begins, pay 1[Resource] or discard this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a Battle ability triggers, exhaust your warlord to cancel its effects. Then, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this warlord commits to a planet or is declared as an attacker, put a Snotlings token into play at this planet. Forced Reaction: After the combat phase ends, destroy each Snotlings token in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the combat phase ends, destroy each Snotlings token in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit takes damage, put a Snotlings token into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord is declared as a defender, put a Snotlings token into play at the same planet as your warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an Oddboy unit. Reaction: After a Snotlings token is destroyed, exhaust this attachment to put a Snotlings token into play at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an [Ork] unit you control is declared as an attacker, it gets +X ATK for that attack. X is the number of Snotlings tokens at the same planet as the attacking unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After an enemy warlord commits to this planet, exhaust this unit to put a Space Wolves unit into play from your hand at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, a target [Space Marine] unit you control at a planet with your warlord gets +2 ATK for each command icon it has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a [Space Marine] unit you control is destroyed, exhaust this support to gain 1[Resource].

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a non-Vehicle unit you control at this planet is assigned damage by an attack, prevent 1 of that damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to deploy a unit with cost 2 or lower at a planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After the combat phase begins, deal 1 damage to each unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Deal X damage to a target enemy army unit. X is the amount of damage on that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Nurgle army unit. Combat Action: Sacrifice this attachment to give attached unit Area Effect (2) until the end of the combat round.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, exhaust this support to look at the top 3 cards of a deck. Discard 1 of those cards, and place the remaining cards on top of that deck in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Deal 3 unpreventable damage to a target non-warlord unit at a planet with your warlord. Your opponent may discard 2 cards to cancel this effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gains Mobile while it is undamaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an [Eldar] army unit. Interrupt: When you use a shield card to prevent damage to attached unit, exhaust this attachment to double the number of shields on that card.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gains Area Effect (2) while it has 1 or more attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust your warlord to trigger the Battle ability at the same planet as your warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an enemy army unit. Double damage dealt to attached unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Sacrifice a unit at this planet to give this warlord +3 ATK for its next attack this phase. (Limit once per attack.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leaves play, ready your warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When you sacrifice a non-token unit, exhaust this support to put 2 Guardsman tokens into play at the same planet as the sacrificed unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Attached warlord gets +1 ATK. Combat Action: Detach this card to have it become an army unit with 1 ATK and 1 HP and the text: 'Action: Return this unit to your hand.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When a unit you control leaves play from a planet with your warlord, return that unit to your hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, rout 1 or more target Ally units at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After attached unit damages an enemy unit by an attack, deal damage equal to attached unit's ATK value to another target unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced Reaction: After this unit resolves its attack, deal 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each non-token F unit you control gets +1 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +2 ATK while it is at a planet with a warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy an Elite unit, deal 1 damage to that unit to deal 1 damage to each enemy unit at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deploy Action: Exhaust your warlord to have your opponent deal X indirect damage among units he controls. X is the number of units your opponent controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit leavec play, draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust your warlord to discard up to 3 cards at random from a target player's hand. Then, that player draws cards equal to the number of cards discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a L army unit. Attached unit cannot be dealt damage by an army unit with printed cost 2 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, exhaust each non-Spirit unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Move 1 or more units you control at a planet with your warlord to your HQ.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When an effect would move a unit you control from a planet, exhaust this support to cancel that effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each Ethereal unit you control at this planet, this unit gets +2 ATK and gains 1 command icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust this support to move an Ethereal unit from your HQ to a target planet. Then, ready that unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gets +3 ATK while it is at a planet with your warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit moves from one planet to another, exhaust this support to give that unit +2 ATK for its next attack this phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 Relic per player. Attach to a Mobile unit. Interrupt: When attached unit declares an attack, declare that attack against an enemy unit at an adjacent planet instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After a unit moves from one planet to another, move that unit to an adjacent planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: The cost for you to play each Torture event is reduced by 1. The cost for you to play each non-Torture event is increased by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard a Torture card from your hand to ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Name a card type (unit, support, attachment, event). Your opponent must either discard 1 card of that type from his hand or deal 1 damage to his warlord.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to your warlord. Reaction: After you play a Torture event card, exhaust attached warlord to copy its effects. You may choose new targets.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your opponent plays with the top card of his deck revealed. Action: Exhaust this support to discard the top card of each player's deck or have each player draw 1 card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After you deploy this unit, your opponent cannot commit his warlord to this planet this round unless it is the only planet in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After your warlord commits to a planet with an enemy warlord, draw 3 cards. Max 1 per turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust this support to have a target unit at a planet without an enemy warlord get -2 ATK until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When this unit is destroyed, put 4 Snotlings tokens into play at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Interrupt: When an army unit you control leaves play from a planet with your warlord, deal damage equal to that army unit's printed ATK value to a target non-warlord unit at the same planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Target a non-Vehicle army unit. Until the end of the phase, set that unit's ATK value to 1, its printed text box is treated as blank (except for Traits), and it gains the Squig trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Sacrifice a Cultist unit to ready this unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a planet. Increase the cost of each enemy unit being deployed at another planet by 1. Forced Reaction: After a battle at attached planet ends, sacrifice this attachment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an army unit. Reaction: After attached unit uses its Area Effect ability, deal damage equal to its Area Effect value to each enemy unit at each adjacent planet. Then, sacrifice the attached unit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit damages an enemy unit, exhaust a target support card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Combat Action: Exhaust a target enemy unit at a planet without an enemy warlord. Then, deal damage equal to that unit's ATK value to another target unit at that planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: This unit gains Ranged while you control an Ethereal unit at this planet.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust your warlord to ready each unit you control with 1 or more attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: After this unit enters play, each player must choose and discard down to 4 cards in his hand, if able.
